data.communities: London.pm mailing list, Talk at London Perl Workshop 04
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module extends Data::Page so the user can have sets of Pages.

    Data::Page::Pageset has been uploaded recently, the functionality
    is different, ideally I would like to add it to Data::Pageset, I am
    trying to contact the author. Data::Pageset is used by many people
    in production code.
